title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin takes the day off so Joy Taylor steps in to share why the newest villains in the NBA is great for the league. She also believes Russell Wilson and Aaron Rodger have both put themselves under a ton of pressure heading into next season. She also officially declares she is DONE believing in Carson Wentz. Plus, Hall of Famer Jason Taylor joins the show to talk about coaching at the University of Miami and the struggles of trying to make it in the NFL. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
